plot outline: Watch the full movie, Neelambari, only on Eros Now. Neelambari is a 2001 Indian Kannada film, directed by Surya and produced by Kari Subbu, Raju Thipatur, N R Chandrashekar, Prakash, M D Sridhar. The film Ramya Krishna, Devaraj, Prema, Vinod Alva, Suman, Charulatha, Archana, Thara, Charu Hasan in lead roles. The film has musical score by M Ranga Rao.
